column1: 5.  Accordingly, the Learned High Court Judge sentencedthe Appellants as follows:
  For the 1stcount: -three years rigorous imprisonment and a fine of Rs 5000.00
carrying a default sentence of one year imprisonment.
  For the 2ndcount: - three years rigorous imprisonment and a fine of Rs 5000.00
carrying a default sentence of one year imprisonment.
  For the 5thcount: -two years rigorous imprisonment and a fine of Rs 5000.00
carrying a default sentence of one year imprisonment.
  For the 6thcount: - two years rigorous imprisonment and a fine of Rs 5000.00
